name: Logger (Hayes Publishing)
overview: A take on Donkey Kong that was published in the book "Getting Ahead: Fantastic Games". You are a lumberjack who has just had his axe stolen by a bird. You must get to the bird by jumping logs and climbing ladders. Jump up to pull the ladders down. Get bonus points and an extra man every 8000 points. D to climb, Z is left, C is right and space bar to jump. The game is a take on a rather infamous arcade Donkey Kong knockoff of the same name.
